definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: However, when the airflow is turbulent, the boundary layer sticks to the ball for longer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，当气流为湍流时，边界层维持时间较长。

sentences.english: Recently, inverse statistics has been applied widely in both turbulence and econophysics.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，反统计被广泛用于分析湍流和金融物理。

sentences.english: Turbulent coherent structures in the outer region of TBL are mainly lateral vortices.
sentences.chinese: 湍流边界层外区的相干结构主要表现为大尺度横向涡。

sentences.english: The accuracy of flat plate, turbulent skin friction at supersonic speeds.
sentences.chinese: 超音速速度下平板，湍流蒙皮摩擦的精确度。

sentences.english: The directional sensitivity of hot-wire effects the measurement accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 热线的方向系数对湍流测量精度很有大的影响。

sentences.english: Mountain torrents rush down from the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 山里的湍流从峭壁上直泻而下。

sentences.english: A unified second order moment model of turbulent combustion is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种湍流燃烧统一二阶矩模型。

sentences.english: The turbulence of gas phase was modeled by the gradient simulation approach.
sentences.chinese: 采用梯度模拟来考虑气相可压缩性对气相湍流的影响。

sentences.english: The present paper reviews the developments of plate manipulators used to reduce skin friction in turbulent boundary layers.
sentences.chinese: 本文回顾了平片型湍流控制器的研究发展过程。

sentences.english: Drag reduction in wall turbulence is always an important research topic in fluid mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 壁湍流减阻一直是湍流研究的热点问题。

sentences.english: Drag reduction in wall turbulence is always an important research topic in fluid mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 壁湍流减阻一直是湍流研究的热点问题。

sentences.english: Cavity is flame holder in high turbulent supersonic combustion.
sentences.chinese: 凹腔是高湍流度超声速燃烧的火焰稳定装置。

sentences.english: A young river gathers water into a swift-running current.
sentences.chinese: 一条年轻的河流集水于湍流之中。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an ultra-intense turbulent current mass transfer tower.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种超强湍流传质塔。

sentences.english: Air-sea turbulence Flux Observing is of great importance to the study of air-sea exchange.
sentences.chinese: 海气界面大气湍流通量监测对研究海气交换意义重大。

sentences.english: NOTE-Tube vibration from turbulent buffeting is possible.
sentences.chinese: 注型管从湍流抖振是可能的。

definition: turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
